events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Identified the customer's request as a refund issue based on the description of receiving the wrong item.
The support case was assigned to the refunds specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Sorry to hear about the trouble with your order. I'll help you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456 and Iâ€™ve attached a photo showing the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick help! I appreciate the refund offer and will wait for it to appear soon.
The refund process has been initiated successfully and should reflect in your account shortly.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, the refund appeared today in my account. Thank you very much for your support and speedy service!
Closing this case as the refund was successfully received and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to gather your feedback about your recent support experience.
